DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine long term safety preliminary efficacy intramedullary transplantation HuCNS-SC cell subject thoracic spinal cord trauma .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Follow-Up Transplanted Human Central Nervous System Stem Cells ( HuCNS-SC ) Spinal Cord Trauma Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The investigation multi-year observational study follow completion open-label , single dose Phase I/II study involve transplantation allogeneic HuCNS-SC cell 12 subject thoracic spinal cord injury . Subjects monitor routine interval safety preliminary efficacy four year . The LTFU study commence follow one year post-transplantation termination visit Phase I/II investigation .
DOC.criteria: Must undergone HuCNSSC transplantation subject Phase I/II trial Must agree comply good faith condition study attend require study visit Subjects receive receive offprotocol immunosuppressive medication Subjects , completion Phase I/II trial ( Protocol # CLN02SC ) , enter enter investigational study .
